name: Shardreign - A Love Story
description:
Shardreign - A love Story is a Open Ended First Person Party Based Visual Novel Puzzle Game! Four kids attempt want to play D&D, but have NO idea how and so decide to wing it! Use your party’s abilities, items and wits to solve different puzzles! No puzzle has only one single solution, so just experiment and see what happens!

Unfortunately due to time constraints we couldn’t get all the content we wanted into the game, but there’s enough of a game here that we feel like its worth submitting, we had fun making it and we hope you have fun playing it!
